price: 4. Албатта Аллоҳ Ўзининг йўлида гўё туташ бинолардек бир сафга тизилган ҳолларида жиҳод қиладиган зотларни севар.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِهِۦ صَفّٗا كَأَنَّهُم بُنۡيَٰنٞ مَّرۡصُوصٞ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yuḥibbu alladhīna yuqātilūna fī sabīlihi ṣaffan ka-annahum bun'yānun marṣūṣun
